name: Magic and Throne
description:
Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Ashan!

There is an underground labyrinth beneath the land of the elves,and the seal of the devil is at the end of the labyrinth.Go to the city of angels and restart the ancient covenant,they will respond and support you,Allied forces are ready to attack the flame hell!

FEATURES
● Exquisite character art and design，hundreds of heroes with unique abilities
● Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills
● Take part in exciting campaigns and adventures
● Fight with EPIC boss and challenge dragon
● Participate in events & get rewards or rare items
● Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goals

Enjoying Magic&Throne
Learn more:

Facebook: www.facebook.com/magicandthrone
Email:mat-service@machbird.com

Prove your power, become a real legend and play with us now!

Good luck with battles, Brave Hero, and remember! – We are always here for you

Your Magic&Throne Team.
